## 📦 Install dan Load Library

```{r install-libs, eval=FALSE}
install.packages("arules")
install.packages("arulesViz")
install.packages("htmlwidgets")
install.packages("igraph")
install.packages("visNetwork")
```

```{r load-libs}
library(arules)
library(arulesViz)
library(htmlwidgets)
```

## 📂 Data Transaksi

```{r}
data <- list(
  c("M", "O", "N", "K", "E", "Y"),    # T100
  c("D", "O", "N", "K", "E", "Y"),    # T200
  c("M", "A", "K", "E"),              # T300
  c("M", "U", "C", "K", "Y"),         # T400
  c("C", "O", "K", "I", "E")          # T500
)

trans <- as(data, "transactions")
inspect(trans)
```

## 🔍 Menambang Aturan Asosiasi dengan FP-Growth (Apriori)

```{r}
rules <- apriori(
  trans,
  parameter = list(
    supp = 0.6,
    conf = 0.8,
    target = "rules"
  )
)

inspect(sort(rules, by = "lift"))
```

## 🌐 Visualisasi Aturan (Graph Interaktif)

```{r, results='asis', echo=FALSE}
plot(rules, method = "graph", engine = "htmlwidget")
```

**Catatan:** Grafik akan tampil langsung di HTML saat di-*knit*. Jika ingin menyimpan ke file:

```{r, eval=FALSE}
library(htmlwidgets)
htmlwidgets::saveWidget(
  plot(rules, method = "graph", engine = "htmlwidget"),
  "fp_growth_rules.html",
  selfcontained = TRUE
)
```
